data.text: @Jeeeeeeric Hi Jeric! As per checking, our website is up and running. You may do the following troubleshooting and try again. -Clear your browser's cache and cookies -Use another device (e.g. laptop, desktop computer, etc.) -Try to use Google Chrome browser if possible. Stay safe.

@teyamond Hi Tey! Yes, you can bring a hair drier and hair styling tools in your hand carry, as long as it fits in the dimensions for hand carry. Learn more about it here https://t.co/rfiF2XsjFi. Please pack it properly to avoid breakage.

@daiisydaph We are sorry to hear the inconvenience you may have felt, Daphne. To check on this further, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK and start chatting with our live agents. We'll wait for you there, Thanks!
@selle_sta HI Selle! You can check on the breakdown indicated on the booking summary when you avail a ticket. Thank you
@paul90hn Thank you for raising the concern, Paul. To assist you further, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK and start chatting with our live agents. We'll wait for you there, Thanks!
@debbiealyssaaa It will be updated on the day of your flight, Debbie once you present the renewed passport at the check-counter. Thank you

@VonVoyeur Thank you for raising the concern and we are sorry to hear the inconvenience you may have felt, VonVoyeur. To check on this further, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBw3mMi and start chatting with our live agents. We'll wait for you there, Thanks!

@Ladie43833567 Hi Ladie! If you are looking for a specific fare, route and/or flight schedule, please visit our website at https://t.co/kPgrcWAGam.  For the latest seat sale, you may refer to https://t.co/kGsg6DVkSv. Thank you and hope to see you onboard!

@prdsjaebi We are sorry to hear your frustrations, ali. For us to further check on your concern, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK and start chatting with our live agents. We'll wait for you there, Thanks!
@danispace_ Hi dani! Rebooking depends on the fare difference based on the available fare when your rebook. Thank you

@FromCaenToParis Thank you for raising the concern and our apologies also for the inconvenience, Casque Kader. To check on this further, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK and start chatting with our live agents. We'll wait for you there, Thanks!
@Gorio42852440 Hi Gorio! Our website and app are both up and running. Kindly consider in clearing your cache, cookies and search history then try again. Thank you

@joannamaried Hi Joanna! For a better CEB customer experience, we're moving all of our chat engagements here: https://t.co/GI0vBwkpOi. Click on the link and start chatting with Charlie the Chatbot and our live agents! We'll wait for you there, Thanks!
@debbiealyssaaa Hello Debbie! Yes, you may book a flight using your old passport. Just make sure that the renewed passport is available on the day of the flight. Thank you
@leonasta4 Hi Leona! Yes, these IDs may be used for check-in as long as valid. Be reminded that it will be under the discretion of the check-in counter also. Thank you
@Chicken22267198 Hi there! Frozen food is not allowed in your hand carry due to the possibility of leaks and foul smell in the cabin. Thank you
@markyexplorerRL Thank you also for choosing us for your travel, Marky. Have a good day and see you again onboard soon!

@Chicken22267198 Hi Chicken. Yes, cooked ham  for personal consumption is allowed in your hand carry as long as it does not emit strong odors . Please ensure that it's properly packed and sealed to avoid any spills in the cabin. For more info, visit (https://t.co/EhmSrp2L5V). Thanks!

@anon1995anon Hi Tanya. For bookings with schedule changes of one (1) hour or more, sorry to inform you that we cannot offer any options except for rebooking or travel fund. The owner of the fund may now use it to book for anyone  thru your MyCebuPacific. Thanks!
@ikevinrico Hi Kevin! Tel here. Sorry for this. May I ask what error have you encountered? Thank you!
@Ayamazed Yes, you can bring a hair drier and hair styling tools in your hand carry, as long as it fits in the dimensions for hand carry. Thank you!
@Ayamazed Please be advised that item is for check-in. Thank you!

@StellaLeda1 Hi Stella. For flights affected of cancellation. Yes, we may refund if your seats are no longer available on your new date. To further assist you, please send us a  message  via https://t.co/zvAz6wDXJv . Or, send us a private message via: https://t.co/gNaqWVnrV6. Thanks!

@StellaLeda1 Hi Stella. For affected guests due to flight cancellation are given options. If the new schedule is not acceptable,you may conveniently self-manage your booking , select the option/ schedule that would be best suitable for you.  Again, we apologize for the inconvenience. Thanks!

data.text: @diovielsm Hi Jobe! Tel here.  We will help you look into it. For assistance and the security of your personal information, you may send the details of your concern thru: https://t.co/GI0vBwkpOi and ask Charlie to connect you to a live chat agent. Stay safe.
@khaikhayy There are also restrictions on the type of food, especially for those producing foul smell (i.e., durian, etc.). Hope this helps!

@khaikhayy There are some airport stations that do not allow pork, fruits, chicken, etc.
Some cooling agents / refrigerants may be considered as Dangerous Goods which may be allowed in limited quantities.

@khaikhayy Yes, you can bring frozen food in your checked baggage, as long as it is packed properly and sealed to avoid spillage and emission of odors. Please also consider the following guidelines: 
Frozen food must be allowed by the local government unit of your origin and destination.

@khaikhayy Hi Khai. We may accept lechon as part of your check-in baggage. If traveling to International, we suggest to coordinate with bureau of customs of your destination for more information. Thank you.
@joieva Guest feedback form link is working. Make sure to visit https://t.co/7yR2XSIMwc. If error persist, send us the screenshot. Thank you.
@diovielsm We are sorry to hear about this, diovielsm. How can we help you?

data.text: @xxjenblinkeu And once done, your bank also will be the one to reverse the amount to your account. Hope this clarifies. Thank you

@xxjenblinkeu The amount was in floating status to which you have to coordinate with your bank for dispute purposes and for reversal as well. Your bank will be the one to investigate and coordinate this with the merchant bank.

data.text: @xxjenblinkeu Be advised that payment might be confirmed in your bank indeed but unsuccessful in our end. This means that the payment was not successfully transmitted to us that's why the booking has not been confirmed.
@xxjenblinkeu Thank you for providing the case numbers. Based on the cases, your booking was not confirmed due to payment was unsuccessful on our end.
@xxjenblinkeu Have you files a case on this already? If so, appreciate if you could send us the case number so we can further check on it? Thank you

@xxjenblinkeu In that case, kindly send us the concern together with the details of the booking thru our Guest Feedback Form via this link: (https://t.co/7yR2XSIMwc) so we can further check on it. Thank you.

data.text: @moonyeen_mj Hi kris. Guest will be accepted as long as Fit to travel. If guest will be needing extra seatbelt while on board, kindly advise to seek an assistance to any of our crew. Hope this helps!
@Ladie43833567 Hi Ladie! More seat sale is coming. Keep checking our website or social media pages for announcement or https://t.co/wngAzjsqbM. Hope t see you on board soon!

@chanvillena Thank you for raising the concern and we are sorry to hear the inconvenience you may have felt, Chris. To check on this further, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBw3mMi and start chatting with our live agents. We'll wait for you there, Thanks!
@AlexisWithLuv HI Alexis! We are sorry but you can no longer cancel the rebooking once flight booking is modified. We suggest to settle the amount due to confirm your booking. Thank you.

@pokieeify Fares are subject to change, pokieeify. Please check and search or the lowest fare for your preferred flight and schedule through our website at https://t.co/kPgrcWBdZU. We hope to see you on board soon!
@EbreoJosel avoid any spills in the cabin.  For more info, visit https://t.co/rfiF2XsjFi. Hope this helps!

@EbreoJosel Hi there, EbreoJosel. Joe an here. Yes, lechon for personal consumption is allowed in your hand carry as long as it fits the size limitation based on our baggage rules. Please ensure that it's properly packed and sealed to

@itsmepaji We are sorry to hear about this experience, paji. Before accessing the website or mobile app, we recommend you check your internet connection. If your connection is fine, please clear your cache, delete cookies then try again. We hope to see you on board soon!

@ra12man Sorry to hear this, ra12man. Don't worry, I'll let your case handler know that you reached out so that we can send you an update. Please expect an email from us soon. Thanks for your patience!
@douraG21 Yes, douraG21. Tripods are not allowed in your hand carry for safety reasons.

@iamredsonmarte Thank you for raising the concern and we are sorry to hear the inconvenience you may have felt, @iamredsonmarte. To check on this further, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBwkpOi and start chatting with our live agents. We'll wait for you there, Thanks!

data.text: @17hjyjmjaydhjj Hi Nini . We will be glad to look into your concern. To further assist you and the security of your personal information, please send us a  message  via Charlie the chatbot  thru: https://t.co/zvAz6wDXJv, and ask Charlie to connect you to a live chat agent. Thanks!

@17hjyjmjaydhjj Hi Nini. You may purchase prepaid baggage allowance upon booking and up to 2 hours before your flight via our website(https://t.co/5TLfYWvFud) . For more information on prepaid baggage, click here https://t.co/lXA1ChoAfE.  Hope this helps.  Thank you and Have a great day ahead!
